workflows.creator: f21f100c-9e62-42e2-a744-061c18de134c
workflows.title: Sync Contract Review Status NS -> SF

text-helpers-1.title: Parse netsuite id
text-helpers-1.description: Netsuite Id is informed as a string and is needed to transform to a number to search in salesforce

salesforce-1.title: Search Opportunity by Parent
salesforce-1.description: Searching by parent because in netsuite the Contract Review Status is linked to the parent subscription, where the current Contract exists

netsuite-1.title: Query list options
netsuite-1.description: Getting with suiteQL the options list to get the name because in salesforce we need to upsert with the name

q.value:
select id, name, 'caps' as type from customlist_crc_caps_options
UNION ALL
select id, name, 'contract_type' as type from customlist_crc_contract_type
UNION ALL
select id, name, 'entitlements' as type from customlist_crc_entitlements_options
UNION ALL
select id, name, 'foreign_entities' as type from customlist_crc_foreign_entities_option
UNION ALL
select id, name, 'paper_type' as type from customlist_crc_paper_type
UNION ALL
select id, name, 'transfer_of_rights' as type from customlist_crc_transfer_of_rights

message.value: Contract Review Status {$.steps.trigger.data.record.id} deleted from Netsuite and not found in salesforce.
